name: To the Summit
description:
IMPORTANT

|||

Once you open the game, press P to open the settings menu, Increase the volume & turn on Postprocessing. sorry for this bug. Due to time, I couldn't submit a WebGL version so I uploaded it into a separate project HERE: https://fire-phantom.itch.io/to-the-summit-webgl

note that these 2 versions are the same except few bugs present (the HTML version is less buggy, there is a windows version of that too).

this note will be removed once the voting period is done.

|||

Made for Brakeys Game Jam 2022.1

.

Go through a journey to the mountain's summit with Jake & Amanda on this walking simulator.

.

Controls:

WASD / Arrows: Walk

Space / Z: Jump

P: Settings

.

Thanks For Playing!

Any feedback would be great!

.

Made By

Ven
